name: Little Italy Presto Bruschetta
description: Fresh and bursting with flavour, this recipe will be made time and time again!
preparation: Lay baguette slices on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner and lightly brush baguette slices with olive oil using a basting brush. Broil for 2 minutes each side, or until golden.
Combine Little Italy Sauce, tomatoes, and Black pepper in a small mixing bowl.
Spoon 1 tbsp of mixture onto each baguette slice. Sprinkle with parmesan and place back under broiler for approximately 1â€“2 more minutes and serve.
